DOC.criteria: Female ASA III Age 1875 Elective laparoscopic surgery Known predict difficult airway Oropharyngeal pathology Mouth opening < 3.0 cm A body mass index > 35 kg m2 Increased risk aspiration Inability communicate understand visual analogue scale Analgesics within 24 hour surgery
